item.title: Gesture detectors
item.description:
We need to review the gesture detectors implementation in order to solve various reported issues and improve its functionality.
We could examine the use of an external framework for this purpose, like Android Gesture Detectors.

item.contents: BTW I tested Mapsforge 0.3.X with latest Android and we have also with it pinch zoom issues. Apparently it's not something new we have added since then, but nevertheless things to be improved.
